#labels vimrc
syntax on

set autoindent
set smartindent

set tabstop=4
set shiftwidth=4

set vb t_vb=

set ruler
set incsearch
set ignorecase

color murphy

set guifont=Lucida\ Console\ Semi-Condensed\ 12

set tags=tags;/

"using mouse
set mouse=a

" show the command
set showcmd

" Tlist的内部变量。函数列表。
let Tlist_Use_Right_Window=1
let Tlist_File_Fold_Auto_Close=1
" 打开当前目录文件列表
"map <F5> :Explore<CR>
" 函数和变量列表
"map <F6> :TlistToggle<CR>

" 搜索当前词，并打开quickfix窗口
"map <F7> :call Search_Word()<CR>
" " 全能补全
"inoremap <F8> <C-x><C-o>

" step into
"map <F2> <C-]>
" step out
"map <F3> <C-t>
"map <F4> <\-m>

" auto full the command under command pattern
set wildmode=list:full
set wildmenu
